@225B CES THUB BSTAN YONGS KYI MNGA' BDAG KUN MKHYEN BLA MA
  KHYAB BDAG RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I RDO RJE
  DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG PO'I THUGS KYI BUM BZANG LAS 'ONGS
  PA'I LEGS BSHAD BLA MED PA BSTAN BCOS CHEN PO DBU MA LA 'JUG PA'I MTHA' DPYOD LUNG RIGS SGRON ME ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DOS CAG YONGS DGON MTSAN NYID GRVA TSANG GI BLA MA'I LAS KHUR BYED SKABS, SPYIR THA MA RDO RJE 'CHANG GI 'PHRIN LAS SPEL SLAD DANG, KHYAD PAR LEGS BSHAD 'DI NYID TSIG NYUNG LA DON ZAB CING, DBANG PO RAB 'BRING THA GSUM GANG GI YANG BLO YUL DU 'TSAMS PA BCAS GANG CI NAS BRTZI BZHAG TU GTONG 'DUN YOD PAR MA ZAD, NYE LAM DBU MA GSAR SKING GI 'DZIN GRVA NAS KYANG BRTZI BZHAG TU GTONG DGOS TSUL NAN CAN BYUNG BA BZHIN, BRTZI BZHAG TU BTANG SKABS, 'DI NYID KYI DPE RGYUN SHIN TU DKON GSHIS, CHOS SBYIN RGYA CHER SPEL SLAD, DBU MA GSAR BA'I 'DZIN GRVA NAS, DAD BRTZON RNAM DPYOD DANG LDAN PA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BSTAN PAS DNGUL SRANG LNGA BCU DONG TZE KHRON BCU, DGE SLONG 'JAM DBYANGS, MKHAS GRUB KYIS DNGUL SRANG BCO LNGA, ZHABS DRUNG 'JAM DBYANGS CHOS GRAGS KYIS DNGUL SRANG BCO LNGA, DGE SLONG 'JAM DBYANGS SHES RAB KYIS DONG TZE KHRON BCU, SKYES DPON DGE SLONG MANGGA LAm SOGS GRVA MANG NAS DONG TZE KHRON PA NYI SHU RTZA GSUM BCAS KYI RGYU @226A *, ,YON SBYAR TE, PAR DU BSGRUB PA'I DO DAM PA DPYOD YANGS DGE SLONG 'JAM DBYANGS BSAM GTAN GYIS DAD 'DUN RTZE GCIG GIS, PAR YIG DANG DBU SHOG GE LANYDZA DBU LHA DANG BCAS PA BRIS SHING, PAR YIG DAD PAR DU 'KHOD GRUB RIM GYI ZHUS DAG BCAS NGOS CAG RANG GIS BGYIS TE, PAR GSAR BSKRUN GYI PAR BYANG SMON TSIG 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES GONG SMOS DAD LDAN RNAMS NAS MGRIN GCIG TU BSKUL NGOR, BLA MA RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO GANG GI ZHABS RTUL SPYI BOS BSTAN PA'I GTZUN CHUNG BLO BZANG 'JAM DBYANGS RGYA MTSO'AM MING GZHAN AA KY'A HO THOG THUR 'BOD PAS ME SBRUL SA ZLA'I GRAL TSES DGE BAR SBYAR BA DZA YANTU,
